card.title: Most likely to vote the same

info.lead: List of 5 MPs that most often vote the same as the "vote of the parliamentary group". MPs are ranked ascending. Lower the value, higher the matching in voting.
text: We calculate the Euclidean distance between the results of parliamentary group's voting and everyone else's voting (votes are converted to numerical values between -1 and 1).
When we calculate the "distance" between all the MPs we rank them based on the result and show the top 5.
The numerical values of the votes
